title: Add Patient to Appointment Waitlist
description: A provider's schedule is full, but a patient wants to be notified if an earlier appointment becomes available.

tasks.description: Identify the patient and the type of appointment they need.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the patient's details and the desired appointment.

tasks.description: Confirm there are no available appointments in the desired timeframe.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the provider's schedule is booked.

tasks.description: Add the patient to the provider's appointment waitlist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the patient to the waitlist, so they will be automatically flagged if a cancellation occurs.
